content: Reminds me of myself a few months ago when our office wasn’t so spacious to comfort everyone at a time. I had to swap places consistently and one fine day I figured out I’m the only one who seem to react in the reverse way (was seeking silent zone). Things went on without any change, but somehow I managed to stay put with my work and productivity, by being in the “wired mode”. The only possible way that let me write something which eventually got mentioned in “Top 25 Inbound Article”.
